name: 2120 (Expositive)
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

Theme: Out Of Control

2120 is a game where you have to stop a virus epidemic by keeping it mild for 15 seconds. If you cross Extreme Epidemic, the virus will turn into a pandemic. If you reach Extreme Pandemic for 15 seconds, you lose.

A pandemic has happened every century for the last 700 years. I don't want to bore you with the details but it's true. That's why the game is named 2120.

To stop the epidemic from becoming worse, you will have to build walls to stop the virus from entering other territories. Then place down the quarantine symbol to get rid of the source of the virus. After that, you place down a hospital symbol to start healing the area and turning it green. Try to keep it controlled! If it gets worse, the state will turn into uncontrolled, and then out of control! 

That's basically how you play. I highly recommend you watch the tutorial.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=92CyT8Hq8jE

I had a lot of fun making this game and I hope you will have a lot of fun playing it. If you have any feedback, be sure to leave it in the comments below!

- Matthew Deng

Average playtime: 5 minutes (You might have to try the game a couple times before you get an actual serious virus)

This game was made in Scratch https://scratch.mit.edu/

Music was made in Song Maker - Chrome Music Lab  https://musiclab.chromeexperiments.com/Song-Maker/
